mapper.select: SELECT * FROM car_info WHERE fuel LIKE CONCAT("%",#{fuel},"%") AND ( car_model LIKE CONCAT("%",#{car_model},"%") OR manufacturer LIKE CONCAT("%",#{car_model},"%") )

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CT, CI.CAR_ID, CI.CAR_MODEL, CI.MANUFACTURER, CI.FUEL, CI.KPL FROM CAR AS C LEFT OUTER JOIN CAR_INFO AS CI ON C.CAR_ID = CI.CAR_ID WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = (SELECT A.ID FROM ACCOUNT AS A WHERE A.EMAIL LIKE #{email})
